titleInfo.title: Was brought to the City Police Jail.

mods.abstract: WAS brought to the City Police Jail on the 19th of April, 1862, the griff boy CHARLES REED. Says he is free, and was born in this city. He is 5 feet 5 inches high well built, looks intelligent, speaks English only, he is aged about 21 years. The owner will call and claim his property according to law. MIGUEL HERNANDEZ, JR., Keeper of City Police Jail. Registered May 8, 1862. E. DEVENPORT, Clerk of Comptroller. m9 15t

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent. ([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
